entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
